SEARCH
Package com.indus.training.persist.dao

Interface KeyWordsCounterDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
KeyWordsCounterImpl
public interface KeyWordsCounterDao
Provides methods to save, retrieve, update, and delete keyword counts from a file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteKeyWords(String path)
    Deletes keyword counts of the Specified Project Path.
    Map<String,Integer>
    getKeyWords(String path)
    Retrieves keyword counts from the specified project path.
    boolean
    saveKeyWordsToFile(String path)
    Saves Keywords Count of Given Project path in a file
    boolean
    updateKeyWords(String path)
    Updates keyword counts in the project path.

  • Method Details

    • saveKeyWordsToFile

      boolean saveKeyWordsToFile(String path) throws IOException
      Saves Keywords Count of Given Project path in a file
      Parameters:
      path - the Project path
      Returns:
      true if save was successful else false
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during saving

    • getKeyWords

      Map<String,Integer> getKeyWords(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves keyword counts from the specified project path.
      Parameters:
      path - the project path
      Returns:
      a map of keywords and their counts
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during retrieval

    • updateKeyWords

      boolean updateKeyWords(String path) throws IOException
      Updates keyword counts in the project path.
      Parameters:
      path - the file path
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during updating

    • deleteKeyWords

      boolean deleteKeyWords(String path) throws IOException
      Deletes keyword counts of the Specified Project Path.
      Parameters:
      path - the project path
      Returns:
      true if the delete was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during deletion
